TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SnapLine extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在用户界面 (UI) 中动态创建以便在容器中辅助控件的设计时布局的水平和垂直线段。

span.span: Represents the horizontal and vertical line segments that are dynamically created in the user interface (UI) to assist in the design-time layout of controls in a container.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可视化设计工具支持的常见模式，以帮助你在设计图面上定位和调整控件大小。The following table lists the common modes that visual design tools support to assist you with positioning and sizing controls on a design surface. |“模式”Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |任意Freeform|使您能够自由地布局控件。Enables you to freely lay out controls.| |网格Grid|显示可帮助你对控件进行布局的静态重叠网格。Displays a static overlaid grid that assists you in laying out controls.| |留意Snapline|显示帮助您相对于容器的控件布局的参考线。Displays guide lines that assist you in laying out the container's controls relative to each other. 对齐线源自控件及其容器。Snaplines originate from controls and their container.| 类和相关类型可帮助支持对齐线模式。The class and related types help support the Snapline mode. 当控件边缘移动到另一个控件附近或其容器边界附近时，对齐线会动态地自动生成。Snaplines are generated dynamically and automatically as a control edge moves near another control or near the boundaries of its container. 当从工具箱添加控件，或通过鼠标操作或键盘命令移动控件或调整控件大小时，会发生这种情况。This can occur when a control is added from the toolbox, or moved or resized by mouse operations or keyboard commands. 控件通常定义了水平和垂直对齐线;对于矩形控件，这些控件通常从所有四个边缘进行扩展。Controls typically have both horizontal and vertical snaplines defined; for rectangular controls, these typically extend from all four edges. 类只使用几个属性来描述每个对齐线，如下表所示。The class uses only a few properties to describe each snapline, as shown in the following table. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定行相对于其关联控件的位置和方向。Specifies the location and direction of the line with respect to its associated control. 通常，只有相似类型的对齐线会自动对齐。Typically, only snaplines of similar types will auto-align to each other.| ||指定从原点（控件的左上角）到对齐线开始位置的距离（以像素为单位）。Specifies the distance in pixels from the origin, which is the upper-left corner of the control, to where the snapline starts.| ||指定对齐线的相对重要性。Specifies the relative importance of the snapline. 在任何给定的布局决策点期间，只显示处于活动状态并具有最高优先级的对齐线。During any given layout decision point, only the snaplines that are active and have the highest priority are displayed.| ||定义对齐线的自定义类别。Defines custom categories of snaplines. 这是一个可选字符串。This is an optional string.| | 和 and |指示对齐线是水平方向还是垂直方向。Indicates whether a snapline has horizontal or vertical orientation, respectively.| 类在属性中存储其对应控件类型的对齐线 。The class stores snaplines for its corresponding control type in the property. 对齐线的此类处理将足以满足大部分控件的需求，因为它定义了 、 、 和 对齐线，它们沿控件边缘对齐。This base class handling of snaplines will suffice for the majority of controls, as it defines the , , , and snaplines, which are aligned along the edges of the control. 在开发自定义控件时，如果此默认组织无法满足要求，请重写 派生自的类的属性 。When you are developing a custom control, if this default organization does not suffice, override the property of the class derived from . 例如，你可能想要将基于文本的控件（如标签）的水平对齐线与文本的上边框和底线对齐 (，而不是控件) 的上边缘和下边缘对齐。For example, you may want to align the horizontal snaplines of text-based controls, such as labels, with the top and base lines of the text (instead of the top and bottom edges of the control). 类不能从派生。The class cannot be derived from. Visual Studio 中提供了此功能的广泛支持，请参阅 [演练：使用对齐线排列 Windows 窗体上的控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines)。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio, see [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using Snaplines](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines).

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只应显式创建对齐线来替换或补充可视化设计器提供的默认对齐线行为。You should only explicitly create snaplines to replace or supplement the default snapline behavior offered by the visual designer. 若要创建对齐线，应生成一个对齐线，然后将其添加到 类的属性 。To create a snapline, you should instance a snapline and then add it to the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将对齐线的所有属性设置为程序员提供的值。This constructor sets all of the properties of a snapline to programmer-supplied values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AdjustOffset(int32 adjustment) cil managed

param.name: adjustment
param.span: 对齐线偏移量更改的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to change the snapline offset by.

summary.span: 调整对齐线的 属性。

span.span: Adjusts the property of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对齐线的偏移量是对齐线从关联控件的左上角定位的距离（以像素为单位）。The offset of a snapline is the distance, in pixels, that the snapline is located from the associated control's upper-left origin. 尽管可以将偏移量设置为任何整数值，但对齐线通常会保留属性值隐含的空间关系 。Although the offset can be set to any integer value, typically the snaplines retain the spatial relationships implied by their property value.

public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取与此对齐线关联的由程序员定义的筛选器类别。

span.span: Gets the programmer-defined filter category associated with this snapline.

value.span: 一个 定义筛选器类别。

span.span: A that defines the filter category.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于定义对齐线的自定义类别。The property is used to define custom categories of snaplines. 只有具有相同筛选器名称的对齐线才能彼此对齐。Only snaplines with the same filter name are able to snap to each other. 此属性可在自定义控件设计器中用于根据控件的状态或正在执行的操作的类型来公开不同的对齐线类别。This property can be used in custom control designers to expose different categories of snaplines depending upon the state of the control or the type of operation being performed. 例如，圆形控件可以提供具有筛选器值 "Center" 的自定义对齐线。For example, round controls could offer a custom snapline with the filter value of "Center". 此属性在构造过程中初始化，以后无法更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下对齐线类型为水平： 、 、 和 。The following snapline types are horizontal: , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下对齐线类型为垂直： 、 和 。The following snapline types are vertical: , , and .

public: property int Offset { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取对齐线偏离关联控件的原点的像素数。

span.span: Gets the number of pixels that the snapline is offset from the origin of the associated control.

value.span: 对齐线的偏移量（单位为像素）。

span.span: The offset, in pixels, of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的原点是控件的左上角点。The origin of a control is the upper-left point of the control. 单个偏移量可以描述对齐线的位置，因为垂直对齐线可能只有非零 x 轴偏移量，而水平对齐线的偏移量可能只有非零的 y 轴。A single offset can describe the position of a snapline, because vertical snaplines may have only a nonzero x-axis offset, whereas horizontal snaplines may only have a nonzero y-axis offset. 属性在构造时进行初始化，但可以在之后通过方法进行更改 。The property is initialized at construction time, but it can be changed thereafter with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Priority As SnapLinePriority

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取指示对齐线的相对重要性的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the relative importance of the snapline.

value.span: 表示对齐线优先级类别的 。

span.span: A that represents the priority category of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为与控件相关联的对齐线建立重要性类别。The property establishes categories of importance for the snaplines associated with a control. Windows 窗体设计器使用此属性来确定在控件添加、重设大小或移动操作过程中要显示的对齐线。The Windows Forms Designer uses this property to determine which snaplines to display during a control addition, resize, or move operation. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. 此属性在构造过程中初始化，以后无法更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

summary.span: 获取对齐线的类型，它指示一般位置和方向。

span.span: Gets the type of a snapline, which indicates the general location and orientation.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示对齐线相对于控件边缘的方向和一般位置。

span.span: A that represents the orientation and general location, relative to control edges, of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化设计器使用 属性来指示对齐操作。Visual designers use the property to direct snap alignment operations. 通常，仅面向的对齐线才能彼此对齐。Typically only snaplines that are similarly oriented can snap to each other. 例如，类型的两个对齐线 可以对齐，但 不能对齐。For example, two snaplines of type can snap together, but a and a snapline cannot. 此属性在构造过程中初始化，以后无法更改。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回当前对齐线的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of the current snapline.
A that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串，其中包含有关对齐线的类型、偏移量、优先级和筛选器值的详细信息。This method returns a string that contains details about the type, offset, priority, and filter values of the snapline.
